alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:42PM EDT until June 25 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bibb County in central Georgia... Monroe County in central Georgia... Upson County in west central Georgia... Crawford County in central Georgia... Central Jones County in central Georgia... Northeastern Talbot County in west central Georgia... Northern Taylor County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Lamar County in west central Georgia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 742 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Crest to near Russellville to Wayside, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Macon, Thomaston, Forsyth, Roberta, Yatesville, Payne, Culloden, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Payne City, Lake Tobesofkee, Wayside, Atwater, Round Oak, Russellville, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Wesleyan, Logtown and Sunnyside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Talbot; Taylor; Upson
